original_text: Each pair was one male and one female. They all came to Noah in the ship. Everything happened as God had said to Noah.
korean_text: 하나님이 노아에게 명하신 대로 암수 둘씩 노아에게 나아와 방주로 들어갔으며

sentences.original_text: Each pair was one male and one female
sentences.korean_translation: 각 쌍은 한 마리의 수컷과 한 마리의 암컷이었습니다

sentences.original_text: They all came to Noah in the ship
as God had said to Noah
